title: The Billionaire's Caress
description: Eve found everything she ever could have wanted in billionaire Grant Carlson: incredible looks. Amazing body. Charm, humor, and intelligence to burn. But there are secrets, too. Secrets she never could have guessed... And now they threaten to destroy not only his life, but hers. *A hot and sexy alpha billionaire romance, perfect for fans of J.S. Scott and Hannah Ford*
author: Olivia Thorne
